metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18201 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double free in get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-18201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcdio++1 - 2.0.0-2
libcdio-utils - 2.0.0-2
libcdio19 - 2.0.0-2
libiso9660++0 - 2.0.0-2
libiso9660-11 - 2.0.0-2
libudf0 - 2.0.0-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> code not present in trusty, xenial and artful.

criterions.comment: libcdio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-2').
